What are the treatments for achondrogenesis ?,"These resources address the diagnosis or management of achondrogenesis:  - Gene Review: Gene Review: Achondrogenesis Type 1B  - Genetic Testing Registry: Achondrogenesis type 2  - Genetic Testing Registry: Achondrogenesis, type IA  - Genetic Testing Registr
